page.title: 11BO'NESS THE CUBS
page.content: I am in the cubs and I like them. We always meet on a Monday at 6.45 pm. Our leaders are Baloo,Akela and Bagera. They all respond to the Jungle Book. Baloo is the bear,Akela is the wolf and Bagera is the panther. We have about 36 cubs altogether. Our number is the 3rd Bo'ness,but we are the only cubs in Bo'ness. We play games. When all the cubs form a circle we are given a letter. A beanbag is put in the middle of the circle and Akela shouts a letter. Everybody with that letter runs round the circle once and then turns in to grab the beanbag. I like being in the cubs because I like learning things that would help me. We are trained in tracking things as well. Cubs are great.
